Lottery Policy Statement
1. Purpose of the Lottery To ensure that all participants have an equal opportunity to join the event, a random lottery system will be used to select final registrants from the waitlist.
2. Registration and Waitlist - During the registration period, users may submit an application to join the event waitlist. - No new applications will be accepted after the registration deadline. - The registration period for this event is %1$s to %2$s .
3. Lottery Process - The lottery will be conducted after the registration period ends. - The system will randomly select the required number of participants from the valid waitlist and automatically send notifications to selected entrants. - If a selected entrant fails to complete registration within the specified time or voluntarily declines, the system will draw a replacement entrant from the waitlist following the same rules.
4. Fairness and Transparency - The lottery is executed automatically by the system to ensure complete randomness, without any human interference. - All valid applications have an equal chance of being selected. - The system does not adjust lottery probabilities based on submission time, personal information, or other factors.
5. User Confirmation Before joining the waitlist, users must read and understand the above lottery rules and check the confirmation box to proceed with the application.
6. Supplementary Provisions - This lottery policy applies to all events requiring a lottery process. - The organizer reserves the right to put limit on maximum load of waiting list.
